meanings.definition: Bauhinias: a genus of flowering plants in the legume family
meanings.sent1: The bauhinias in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: Many bauhinias can be found in the botanical garden.
meanings.sent3: The bauhinias seemed to be having a colorful party.
meanings.sent4: The bauhinias stood out like vibrant stars in the green sea of leaves.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the bauhinias' delicate petals.

meanings.definition: Bauhinias: plural form of bauhinia, a type of tropical tree or shrub with showy flowers
meanings.sent1: We admired the bauhinias' bright blossoms in the park.
meanings.sent2: The bauhinias added a tropical touch to the landscape.
meanings.sent3: The bauhinias whispered secrets to the passing butterflies.
meanings.sent4: Her smile bloomed like the bauhinias in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The scent of bauhinias filled the air with sweetness.
